entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
